description: Welsh Fire and Manchester Originals endure a frustrating start to their Women's Hundred campaign as their match at Cardiff is washed out.
title: The Hundred 2023: Welsh Fire v Manchester Originals washed out in women's competition
title_page: The Hundred 2023: Welsh Fire v Manchester Originals washed out in women's competition - BBC Sport
maintext:
Welsh Fire and Manchester Originals endured a frustrating start to their Women's Hundred campaign as their match was washed out without a ball bowled at Sophia Gardens in Cardiff.
Heavy overnight and morning rain left the outfield too wet for the umpires to consider any play.
The game was due to start at 11:30 BST but was called off at 12:10.
The sides are set to meet in the men's competition at 14:30 but that game is also under threat.
